text:
What's stopping people from using the CLI to fetch/upload Marketplace theme?

Right now I could download a theme I've paid for and upload into another portal.... seems like a bit of a security flaw
Not really different from buying a WP theme though. Iâ€™d imagine it would be more of a licensing issue than anything else
This is not a new concern. It's not a security flaw. It is a licensing and IP threat. I have brought it up to HubSpot for years as a concern we've had.

Hi everyone, My name is Sashikumar I am from Geeks On Tap. I have a question about the marketplace app. Here goes. When i get the access token and refresh token from HubSpot, how do I get the meta data to know who install the app in their account? Base on this statement in the HubSpot documentation
